summary: The module implements a complete example for training and evaluating a Graph Attention Network (GAT) on the OGBN‑Proteins node property prediction dataset using DGL and PyTorch. It handles data loading, preprocessing, model construction, training loops, evaluation metrics, and optional result visualization.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation that demonstrates how to apply GAT models to protein‑level graph data for benchmarking and research in graph neural networks and bioinformatics.
